isComplete

public boolean isComplete()
Description copied from interface: Process
Return true if the process has completed, false otherwise. A process is complete if it has no active tokens, either ArcTokens or NodeTokens.

Specified by:
isComplete in interface Process
Returns:
True if the process has completed, false otherwise.
